casebody.data:
176 A.3d 226 IN THE MATTER OF THE APPLICATION OF THE TOWNSHIP OF SOUTH BRUNSWICK, COUNTY OF MIDDLESEX.

M-451/452 September Term 2017

080180 December 8, 2017

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of the South Brunswick Township Planning Board for leave to file a motion for leave to appeal as within time (M-451) is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal (M—452) is denied.
